member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Assessment.Name_Map
member.summary: Alternately can provide a language map

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Assessment.Description
member.summary: Assessment Description Required

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Assessment.Description_Map
member.summary: Alternately can provide a language map

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Assessment.OwnedBy
member.summary: Organization that owns this resource

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Assessment.OfferedBy
member.summary: Organization(s) that offer this resource

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Assessment.CreditUnitType
member.summary: Provide a valid concept from the CreditUnitType concept scheme https://credreg.net/ctdl/terms/creditUnitType

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.BaseRequest.DefaultLanguage
member.summary: DefaultLanguage is used with Language maps where there is more than one entry for InLanguage, and the user doesn't want to have the first language in the list be the language used with language maps.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.BaseRequest.PublishForOrganizationIdentifier
member.summary: Identifier for Organization which Owns the data being published 2017-12-13 - this will be the CTID for the owning org, even if publisher is third party.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.BaseRequest.RegistryEnvelopeId
member.summary: Envelope Identifier Optional property, used where the publishing entity wishes to store the identifier. Contains registry envelope identifier for a document in the registy. It should be empty for a new document.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.BaseRequest.Community
member.summary: Leave blank for default

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.CtdlId
member.summary: A unique URI for this framework. If not entered, a credential registry URI will be generated using the CTID.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.Ctid
member.summary: Globally unique Credential Transparency Identifier (CTID) by which the creator, owner or provider of a credential, learning opportunity competency, or assessment recognizes the entity in transactions with the external environment (e.g., in verifiable claims involving a credential). required

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.alignFrom
member.summary: A competency framework or competency from which this competency framework or competency is aligned. An alignment is an assertion of some degree of equivalency between the subject and the object of the assertion. List of URIs to frameworks

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.alignTo
member.summary: A competency framework or competency to which this competency framework or competency is aligned. An alignment is an assertion of some degree of equivalency between the subject and the object of the assertion. List of URIs to frameworks

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.author
member.summary: A person or organization chiefly responsible for the intellectual or artistic content of this competency framework or competency. List of Names

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.conceptKeyword
member.summary: A word or phrase used by the promulgating agency to refine and differentiate individual competencies contextually. The conceptKeyword property is used in ASN-conforming data solely to denote the significant topicality of the competency using free-text keywords and phrases derived and assigned by the indexer, e.g., "George Washington", "Ayers Rock", etc.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.conceptTerm
member.summary: Concept Term Definition: en-US: A term drawn from a controlled vocabulary used by the promulgating agency to refine and differentiate individual competencies contextually. List of URIs to concepts

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.creator
member.summary: An entity primarily responsible for making this competency framework or competency. The creator property is used with non-canonical statements created by a third party. List of URIs to the creator

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.dateCopyrighted
member.summary: Date Copyrighted Date of a statement of copyright for this competency framework, such as Â©2017.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.dateCreated
member.summary: Date of creation of this competency framework or competency.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.dateModified
member.summary: The date on which this framework or competency was most recently modified in some way.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.dateValidFrom
member.summary: Beginning date of validity of this competency framework. Where the competency document is valid for a given period of time, use both the dateValidFrom and dateValidUntil properties.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.dateValidUntil
member.summary: End date of validity of this competency framework. Where the standard document is valid for a given period of time, use both the dateValidFrom and dateValidUntil properties.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.derivedFrom
member.summary: Derived From Definition: en-US: A third party version of the entity being reference that has been modified in meaning through editing, extension or refinement. List of URIs to frameworks

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.description
member.summary: A short description of this competency framework.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.educationLevelType
member.summary: Education Level Type Definition: en-US:A general statement describing the education or training context. Alternatively, a more specific statement of the location of the audience in terms of its progression through an education or training context. Best practice is to use terms from the http://purl.org/ctdl/terms/AudienceLevel concept scheme. List of URIs to concepts

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.hasTopChild
member.summary: List of the top competencies, those that are directly connected to the framework. Provide either a CTID for a competency that is include in the Competencies property, or the full URI formatted like the following: "https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-b1e0eca2-7a19-49e9-8841-fa16ddf8396d" List of URIs to competencies. NOTE: or just provide the CTIDs, and the system will format the proper URI for the current environment.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.identifier
member.summary: Identifier Definition: en-US: An alternative URI by which this competency framework or competency is identified. List of URIs

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.inLanguage
member.summary: In Language Definition: en-US: The primary language used in or by this competency framework or competency.The primary language used in or by this competency framework or competency. This is the language the text is primarily written in, even if it makes use of other languages. For example, a competency for teaching spanish to english-speaking students would primarily be in english, because that is the language used to convey the material.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.license
member.summary: A legal document giving official permission to do something with this competency framework. Value must be the URI to a license document (e.g., Creative Commons license or bespoke license).

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.localSubject
member.summary: The text string denoting the subject of the competency framework or competency as designated by the promulgating agency. The localSubject property and subject property may or may not point to the same subject. If so, enter the text string for the subject as the value of this property and the URI for that subject in the subject property.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.name
member.summary: The name or title of this competency framework.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.publicationStatusType
member.summary: The publication status of the of this competency framework.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.publisher
member.summary: An agent responsible for making this entity available. Also referred to as the promulgating agency of the entity. List of URIs, for example to a ceterms:CredentialOrganization

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.publisherName
member.summary: Name of an agent responsible for making this entity available.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.repositoryDate
member.summary: The date this competency framework was added to the repository.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.rights
member.summary: Formerly a URI, 19-01-18 Now a language string!!

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.rightsHolder
member.summary: An agent owning or managing rights over this competency framework. URL

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.source
member.summary: The original competency framework which this competency framework is based on or derived from. URI

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.CompetencyFramework.tableOfContents
member.summary: A list of sub-units of this competency framework. The table of contents is a "manifest", or a hierarchic, ordered, syntactic representation of the competencies that are part of this competency framework.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.Ctid
member.summary: Globally unique Credential Transparency Identifier (CTID) by which the creator, owner or provider of a credential, learning opportunity competency, or assessment recognizes the entity in transactions with the external environment (e.g., in verifiable claims involving a credential). required

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.competencyText
member.summary: The text of the competency. This property should be used to provide the actual text of the competency statement. To provide information about the competency other than the text itself, use the comment property.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.alignFrom
member.summary: A competency framework or competency from which this competency framework or competency is aligned. An alignment is an assertion of some degree of equivalency between the subject and the object of the assertion.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.alignTo
member.summary: A competency framework or competency to which this competency framework or competency is aligned. An alignment is an assertion of some degree of equivalency between the subject and the object of the assertion.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.altCodedNotation
member.summary: Alternative Coded Notation An alphanumeric notation or ID code identifying this competency in common use among end-users.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.author
member.summary: A person or organization chiefly responsible for the intellectual or artistic content of this competency framework or competency. List of Names

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.broadAlignment
member.summary: Broad Alignment The referenced competency covers all of the relevant concepts in this competency as well as relevant concepts not found in this competency.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.codedNotation
member.summary: Coded Notation Definition: en-US: An alphanumeric notation or ID code as defined by the promulgating body to identify this competency.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.comment
member.summary: Comment Definition: en-US: Supplemental text provided by the promulgating body that clarifies the nature, scope or use of this competency.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.competencyCategory
member.summary: Competency Category Definition: en-US: The textual label identifying the category of the competency as designated by the promulgating body.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.complexityLevel
member.summary: Complexity Level Definition: en-US: The expected performance level of a learner or professional as defined by a competency.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.comprisedOf
member.summary: Comprised Of Definition: en-US: This competency includes, comprehends or encompasses, in whole or in part, the meaning, nature or importance of the referenced competency. List of URIs

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.conceptKeyword
member.summary: Concept Keyword Definition: en-US: A word or phrase used by the promulgating agency to refine and differentiate individual competencies contextually.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.conceptTerm
member.summary: Concept Term Definition: en-US: A term drawn from a controlled vocabulary used by the promulgating agency to refine and differentiate individual competencies contextually. List of URIs to a concept

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.creator
member.summary: An entity primarily responsible for making this competency framework or competency. The creator property is used with non-canonical statements created by a third party. List of URIs to the creator

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.crossSubjectReference
member.summary: Cross-Subject Reference Definition: en-US: A relationship between this competency and a competency in a separate competency framework. List of URIs to competencies

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.dateCreated
member.summary: Date of creation of this competency framework or competency.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.dateModified
member.summary: The date on which this framework or competency was most recently modified in some way.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.derivedFrom
member.summary: Derived From Definition: en-US: A third party version of the entity being reference that has been modified in meaning through editing, extension or refinement. List of URIs to competencies

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.educationLevelType
member.summary: Education Level Type Definition: en-US:A general statement describing the education or training context. Alternatively, a more specific statement of the location of the audience in terms of its progression through an education or training context. Best practice is to use terms from the http://purl.org/ctdl/terms/AudienceLevel concept scheme. List of URIs to concepts

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.encompasses
member.summary: Resource being described includes, comprehends or encompass, in whole or in part, the meaning, nature or importance of the resource being referenced. Range Includes: ceasn:Competency, ceasn:Concept

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.exactAlignment
member.summary: Exact Alignment Definition: en-US: The relevant concepts in this competency and the referenced competency are coextensive. List of URIs to competencies

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.hasChild
member.summary: Has Child Definition: en-US: The referenced competency is lower in some arbitrary hierarchy than this competency.List of URIs for child competencies under this competency Provide either a CTID for a competency that is include in the Competencies property, or the full URI formatted like the following: "https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-b1e0eca2-7a19-49e9-8841-fa16ddf8396d" List of URIs to competencies. NOTE: or just provide the CTIDs, and the system will format the proper URI for the current environment.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.identifier
member.summary: Identifier Definition: en-US: An alternative URI by which this competency framework or competency is identified. List of URIs

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.isChildOf
member.summary: Is Child Of Definition: en-US: The referenced competency is higher in some arbitrary hierarchy than this competency. List of URIs to competencies. NOTE: or just provide the CTIDs, and the system will format the proper URI for the current environment.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Competency.isTopChildOf
member.summary: Indicates that this competency is at the top of the framework.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.ConceptSchemeRequest.GenerateHasTopChild
member.summary: Generate HasTop/IsTopChild if true, the HasTopChild property is not included in the input document. The HasTopChild property in the JSON document will be generated from the Concept list. Should only be used where the structure is flat. That is there are no concepts have child concepts.

member.summary: Alternately can provide a language map

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Pathway.SubjectWebpage
member.summary: The webpage that describes this entity. URL

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Pathway.HasChild
member.summary: This property identifies a child pathway(s) or pathwayComponent(s) in the downward path. Provide the CTID or the full URI for the target environment. It would be a burden to have a user provide a blank node Id. However, we could recommend that a CTID is provided, and just convert.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Pathway.HasDestinationComponent
member.summary: Goal or destination node of the pathway. Provide the CTID or the full URI for the target environment. URI for a ceterms:PathwayComponent Multipicity: Many

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Pathway.OwnedBy
member.summary: Organization that owns this resource

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.Pathway.OfferedBy
member.summary: Organization(s) that offer this resource

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.PathwayComponentType
member.summary: Type of PathwayComponent. Valid values (with or without ceterms:) : ceterms:AssessmentComponent ceterms:BasicComponent ceterms:CocurricularComponent ceterms:CompetencyComponent ceterms:CourseComponent ceterms:CredentialComponent ceterms:ExtracurricularComponent ceterms:JobComponent ceterms:WorkExperienceComponent

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.Description
member.summary: PathwayComponent Description Required

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.Description_Map
member.summary: Alternately can provide a language map

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.HasCondition
member.summary: Resource(s) that describes what must be done to complete a PathwayComponent, or part thereof, as determined by the issuer of the Pathway. Provide the CTID or the full URI for the target environment. ceterms:ComponentCondition

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.HasChild
member.summary: This property identifies a child pathway(s) or pathwayComponent(s) in the downward path. Provide the CTID or the full URI for the target environment. ceterms:PathwayComponent

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.IsChildOf
member.summary: The referenced resource is higher in some arbitrary hierarchy than this resource. Provide the CTID or the full URI for the target environment. ceterms:PathwayComponent

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.IsDestinationComponentOf
member.summary: Pathway for which this resource is the goal or destination. Like IsTopChildOf Provide the CTID or the full URI for the target environment. ceterms:Pathway

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.Name
member.summary: PathwayComponent Name

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.Name_Map
member.summary: Alternately can provide a language map

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.Points
member.summary: Points associated with this resource, or points possible.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.Preceeds
member.summary: Resource that logically comes after this resource. This property indicates a simple or suggested ordering of resources; if a required ordering is intended, use ceterms:prerequisite instead. Provide the CTID or the full URI for the target environment. ceterms:ComponentCondition

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.Prerequisite
member.summary: Resource(s) that is required as a prior condition to this resource. Provide the CTID or the full URI for the target environment. ceterms:ComponentCondition

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.SourceData
member.summary: URL to structured data representing the resource. The preferred data serialization is JSON-LD or some other serialization of RDF. URL

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.SubjectWebpage
member.summary: The webpage that describes this entity. URL

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.ComponentCategory
member.summary: Component Category Identifies the type of PathwayComponent subclass not explicitly covered in the current array of PathwayComponent subclasses. Used by: ceterms:BasicComponent, ceterms:CocurricularComponent, ceterms:ExtracurricularComponent

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.ComponentCategory_Map
member.summary: Alternately can provide a language map

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.ProgramTerm
member.summary: ProgramTerm Categorization of a term sequence based on the normative time between entry into a program of study and its completion such as "1st quarter", "2nd quarter"..."5th quarter".

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.PathwayComponent.ProgramTerm_Map
member.summary: Alternately can provide a language map

member.summary: Type of credential such as badge, certification, bachelor degree. The credential type as defined in CTDL. Use EntityReference to provide one of: CTID, Registry URI, or 'blank node' Used by: ceterms:CredentialComponent

member.name: T:RA.Models.Input.OrganizationReference
member.summary: Class for handling references to an organization Either the Id as an resolvable URL, a CTID (that will be use to format the Id as a URI) or provide all of the properities: - Type - Name - Description - Subject webpage - Social media

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.OrganizationReference.Type
member.summary: The type of organization is one of : - CredentialOrganization - QACredentialOrganization Required

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.OrganizationReference.SocialMedia
member.summary: Social Media URL links For example, Facebook, LinkedIn

member.name: M:RA.Models.Input.OrganizationReference.IsEmpty
member.summary: Purpose is to determine if class has data

member.name: T:RA.Models.Input.EntityReference
member.summary: Class for handling references to an entity such as an Assessment, Organization, Learning opportunity, or credential Either the Id as an resolvable URL, or provide all of the properities

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.EntityReference.Id
member.summary: Id is a resovable URI If the entity exists in the registry, provide the URI. If not sure of the exact URI, especially if just publishing the entity, then provide the CTID and the API will format the URI. Alterate URIs are under consideration. For example http://dbpedia.com/Stanford_University

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.EntityReference.CTID
member.summary: Optionally, a CTID can be entered instead of an Id. A CTID is recommended for flexibility. Only enter Id or CTID, but not both.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.EntityReference.Type
member.summary: the type of the entity must be provided if the Id was not provided. examples ceterms:AssessmentProfile ceterms:LearningOpportunityProfile ceterms:ConditionManifest ceterms:CostManifest or the many credential subclasses!!

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.EntityReference.Name
member.summary: Name of the entity (required)

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.EntityReference.SubjectWebpage
member.summary: Subject webpage of the entity (required) This should be for the referenced entity. For example, if the reference is for an organization, the subject webpage should be on the organization site.

member.name: P:RA.Models.Input.EntityReference.Description
member.summary: Description of the entity (optional) This should be the general description of the entity. For example, for an organization, the description should be about the organization specifically not, how the organization is related to, or interacts with the refering entity.

member.name: M:RA.Models.Input.EntityReference.HasNecessaryProperties
member.summary: Check if all properties for a reference request are present 17-08-27 We do need a type if only providing reference data

member.name: T:RA.Models.Input.AssessmentComponent
member.summary: Resource that identifies a direct, indirect, formative, and summative evaluation or estimation of the nature, ability, or quality of a resource, performance, or outcome of an action.

member.name: T:RA.Models.Input.BasicComponent
member.summary: Resource that identifies a resource not otherwise covered by the enumerated PathwayComponent subclasses.

member.name: T:RA.Models.Input.CocurricularComponent
member.summary: Resource that identifies an activity, program, or informal learning experience such as a civic or service activity that supplements and complements the curriculum.

member.name: T:RA.Models.Input.ExtracurricularComponent
member.summary: Resource that identifies an activity, program, or informal learning experience that may be offered or provided by a school, college, or other organization that is not connected to a curriculum.

member.name: T:RA.Models.Input.CourseComponent
member.summary: Resource that identifies a structured sequence of one or more learning activities that aims to develop a prescribed set of knowledge, skill, or ability of learners.

member.name: T:RA.Models.Input.Place
member.summary: Content for a Place or Address) NOTE: Use either the string or LanguageMap equivalent property, but not both

member.summary: Optional description of the credit, using either a string value or as a language map
